amendment.description: An amendment numbered 90 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce to $1 the salary of the Director of the Office of Surveillance and Epidemiology at the FDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 272 (Roll no. 422).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 272 (Roll no. 422).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
